intro: Psychotria leptantha, commonly known as the slender psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to the tropical regions of Central and South America, particularly in countries like Brazil and Colombia. The plant is characterized by its small, elliptical leaves and produces clusters of small, white or pale green flowers. It thrives in humid, shaded environments and is often found in tropical rainforests. The plant is also noted for its medicinal properties, with some traditional uses in local herbal remedies.
